DOC.brief_summary: An open label study 9 male 9 female healthy subject determine pharmacokinetics parent compound metabolite eight day dose .
DOC.detailed_description: The study include 9 male 9 female healthy subject . Following informed consent satisfactory screening , dose seven consecutive day outpatient basis OC000459 50 mg daily take breakfast . On seventh day , subject report clinical unit . Following overnight fast , blood sample draw baseline safety pharmacokinetic measurement urine specimen obtain urinalysis baseline metabolite measurement subject dose 50 mg OC000459 . Blood sample drawn select interval 120 hour post dose analyse OC000459 parent compound metabolite . Urine collection obtain period determine excretion metabolite parent compound urine .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male female subject , racial group 2 . Aged 1855 year inclusive 3 . Able comply protocol 4 . Subjects Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 2128 ( BMI = Body weight ( kg ) / ( Height ( ) 2 ) 5 . Subjects clinically significant abnormal serum biochemistry , haematology urine examination value within 21 day first dose 1 . A history gastrointestinal disorder likely influence drug absorption 2 . Receipt medication include counter preparation vitamin within 14 day first study day exception paracetamol maximum 2 g daily 3 . Evidence clinically significant renal , hepatic , cardiovascular metabolic dysfunction 4 . A history drug alcohol abuse 5 . Inability communicate well investigator ( i.e. , language problem , poor mental development impair cerebral function ) 6 . Participation clinical study within 3 month first dose study drug . Subjects check The Over Volunteering Prevention System ( TOPS ) 7 . Donation 450 mL blood within 60 day first dose study drug 8 . A history hypersensitivity and/or idiosyncrasy test compound related drug excipients employ study 9 . Pregnancy lactation
